ctx: intros F FF k f lf Hmult Hdiff.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros F FF k f lf Hmult Hdiff. split. - unfold is_linear. intros a x y. unfold scal. rewrite (Hmult a (f x) (f y)). apply Hdiff. - intros x limx. unfold is_domin in Hdiff. intros eps. specialize (Hdiff eps). unfold is_filter_lim in limx. specialize (Hdiff (locally x) (limx eps)). intros P hx. unfold scal. apply Hdiff. apply hx.
